function.name: TwistPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function publish

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the linear velocity

input.name: lin.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the linear velocity

input.name: lin.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the linear velocity

input.name: rot.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the rotational velocity

input.name: rot.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the rotational velocity

input.name: rot.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the rotational velocity

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message

function.name: TwistVectPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin
input.desc: Linear velocity. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

input.name: rot
input.desc: Rotational velocity. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message

function.name: Twist2DPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin
input.desc: Linear velocity. Component X only

input.name: rot
input.desc: Rotational velocity. Component Z only

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message. Set only lin.x and rot.z, other component is set to 0. Useful to command simple mobile base

function.name: AccelPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function publish

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the linear acceleration

input.name: lin.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the linear acceleration

input.name: lin.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the linear acceleration

input.name: rot.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the rotational acceleration

input.name: rot.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the rotational acceleration

input.name: rot.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the rotational acceleration

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational acceleration in geometry_msgs::Accel message

function.name: AccelVectPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin
input.desc: Linear Acceleration. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

input.name: rot
input.desc: Rotational Accceleration. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational acceleration values in geometry_msgs::Accel message

function.name: Accel2DPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: lin
input.desc: Linear Acceleration. Component X only

input.name: rot
input.desc: Rotational Acceleration. Component Z only

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational acceleration values in geometry_msgs::Accel message. Set only lin.x and rot.z, other component is set to 0. Useful to command simple mobile base

function.name: PoseStampedPub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: frame_id
input.desc: Frame id of the message header

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: position
input.desc: a 3D Vector describing a position.

input.name: orientation
input.desc: a 3D Vector describing an orientation with Euler angle.

function.desc: Publish 3D position and orientation values in geometry_msgs::PoseStamped message. Orienation is given with Euler angle
